mean_cn: n. 宏伟，壮丽，富丽堂皇
mean_en: splendid or imposing in size or appearance
word_etyma: magn大 + ific产生...的 + ence表示性质、状态 → 宏大→magnificence壮丽
short_phrase: the magnificence of the Taj Mahal
sentence: The magnificence of the Taj Mahal is one of India's main tourist attractions.
sentence_trans: 壮丽的泰姬陵是印度的一大旅游景点。
sentence_phrase: The magnificence of the Taj Mahal
